title: Dragon and tower problems
body: I've experienced a problem where  mousing over dragons or towers would  cause my fps to drop considrably. Any help would be appreciated.

replies.body: You may be having an issue with your computer rendering game files possibly due to drivers or even corrupt game files.  DTN provided a great FPS Troubleshoot guide that should help get this fixed up.  Please let me know if you have any questions.

Please head over to the [FPS Troubleshooting Guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-troubleshooting#section-windows) and perform the steps listed. Make sure you test this in Custom games so you can leave without penalty. If nothing helps, please let me know.
